title: Lack of game quaility atm
body:
Noticing alot of trolls, ragers and just straight up selfish players atm.. no sense of teamwork at all..


ranked games on smurf also feel like they have taken a major step backwards.

anyone else feel this?

replies.body: School holidays are a big problem for LoL players.

I see, been a while since i was at school. completely forgot about this.

thanks for the info.
